key.name: hide-on-single-device
key.summary: Preference to show the chooser when only one device is available
key.description: Value set to false hides the device chooser when only one device is available

key.name: show-profiles
key.summary: Preference to show the available profiles for all devices
key.description: Value set to true displays the individual available profiles for each device

key.name: expand-volume-menu
key.summary: Preference to expand volume menu to fit the name of the sound devices
key.description: Value set to true expands the volume menu to fit the names of sound devices displayed in the selector

key.name: use-monochrome
key.summary: Preference to use monochrome icons instead of default icons
key.description: Value set to true uses monochrome icons

key.name: show-input-slider
key.summary: Preference to show input slider always
key.description: Value set to true displays the slider control for input device volume

key.name: show-input-devices
key.summary: Preference to show input device chooser
key.description: Value set to true displays the device chooser for input devices

key.name: show-output-devices
key.summary: Preference to show output device chooser
key.description: Value set to true displays the device chooser for output devices

key.name: ports-settings
key.summary: Preference to hide/show different ports always

key.name: icon-theme
key.summary: Preference indicating the type of icons used by the extension

key.name: hide-menu-icons
key.summary: Preference indicating whether the icons are hidden in the drop-down menu (but are visible in the expanded list).

key.name: enable-log
key.summary: Preference indicating log messages should be written to console

key.name: new-profile-indentification
key.summary: (Deprecated)Old preference name with a typo. To be removed in the next shell version

key.name: new-profile-identification
key.summary: Preference to enable python script to identify port profiles

key.name: cannot-activate-hidden-device
key.summary: Preference to avoid activation of hidden devices in Port Settings

key.name: omit-device-origins
key.summary: Preference to omit device origin at Volume Menu

key.name: integrate-with-slider
key.summary: Preference to integrate selector with slider
